summary: A bunch of misfits and gangsters embarks on a journey to find a lost and stolen diamond.
cast: Sunny Deol|Shahid Kapoor|Vivek Oberoi|Ayesha Takia|Sameera Reddy|Paresh Rawal|Johnny Lever|Jackie Shroff|Sharmila Tagore|Om Puri|Arbaaz Khan|Chunky Pandey|Vijay Raaz|Asrani|Razak Khan|Bhupindder Bhoopii|Gulshan Grover|Zakir Hussain|Suresh Menon|Sunil Pal|Mike Tyson
title: Fool N Final
